org.cleartk.srl
Class ArgumentIdentificationHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.cleartk.srl.ArgumentIdentificationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnnotationHandler<Boolean>
public class ArgumentIdentificationHandler
extends Object
implements AnnotationHandler<Boolean>


Copyright (c) 2007-2008, Regents of the University of Colorado
All rights reserved.

ArgumentIdentifier can work in 3 modes:

  • training mode: take in fully annotated Propbank style data and generate training data for detection of arguments
  • filter mode: take in fully annotated Propbank style data and a model, then add annotations for falsely detected arguments, and remove annotations for missed arguments; this is to facilitate training of AnnotationClassifier
  • annotation mode: take in unlabeled Treebank style data and annotate all detected arguments (no labeling is done by this annotator)

    • Author:
    Philipp Wetzler, Philip Ogren

    process

    public void process(JCas jCas,
                    InstanceConsumer<Boolean> consumer)
             throws CleartkException
    Description copied from interface: AnnotationHandler
    This method should provide the logic for feature extraction and annotation updating/creating based on classifier results. Typically, this method will iterate through annotations in the cas, extract features, and then call consumer.consume() for each instance to be processed.

    Specified by:
    process in interface AnnotationHandler<Boolean>
    Parameters:
    jCas - The JCas object from which ClassifierInstance objects should be derived.
    consumer - The InstanceConsumer object to which the Instance objects created should be passed.
    Throws:
    CleartkException
    See Also:
    ExamplePOSAnnotationHandler

    collectConstituents

    protected void collectConstituents(TreebankNode top,
                                   List<TreebankNode> constituents)
    Recursively build a list of constituents under a TreebankNode.

    Parameters:
    top - the root of the parse tree to operate on; top itself will also be added, unless it is of type TopTrebankNode
    constituents - list of nodes to add to
